body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joshua Williams and the customer's name is Jane Lewis.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joshua Williams, and I am with Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jane! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m actually feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing the right motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand that it can be a tough decision. To help you better, could you please tell me your age?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And may I also have your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one zero one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for sharing that, Jane. Based on your age and location, I have a few models in mind that might suit you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sounds good! I’m excited to hear about them.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for your time today, Jane. I appreciate it and look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle!
